id: scenario-autonomous-entity-manager-scenarios-community-manager coordinates operations to serve community needs workers prioritize
title: Manager coordinates operations to serve community needs workers prioritize
description: Manager coordinates operations to serve community needs workers prioritize
content:
Scenario: Manager coordinates operations to serve community needs workers prioritize
    Given workers democratically decided to prioritize local sourcing
    And operational coordination is needed for supply chain transition
    When Marcus coordinates shift from Sysco to Johnson Farm
    Then Marcus manages logistics of local procurement
    And Marcus tracks quality, costs, and community feedback
    And Marcus ensures operational transition doesn't disrupt service
    And workers govern strategic decision, Marcus executes operationally
    And community benefits from local food system Marcus helps coordinate
